HomePage.first-paragraph: The Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant, established by Ufuk Enerji Elektrik Üretim A.Ş in 2015 in the districts of Kepsut and Susurluk in Balıkesir, has a total installed capacity of 48.5 MWe and 21 wind turbines.
HomePage.second-paragraph: With a total of 17 x 2.3 MW and 4 x 2.35 MW turbines, the Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant contributes to sustainable energy production by utilizing renewable energy sources.
